Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior bears faint traces of three lines of black-painted text, perhaps demotic, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394991) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394991)
